data.text:
Catalog Number SQEX-10296~9

Release Date Dec 14, 2011

Publish Format Commercial

Release Price 3990 JPY

Media Format 4 CD

Classification Original Soundtrack, Vocal

Published by Square Enix (distributed by Sony Music Distribution)

Composed by Masashi Hamauzu, Naoshi Mizuta, Mitsuto Suzuki, Nobuo Uematsu, Yoshitaka Suzuki

Arranged by Masashi Hamauzu, Naoshi Mizuta, Mitsuto Suzuki, Ryo Yamazaki, Yoshitaka Suzuki, Kengo Tokusashi, Shootie HG, Sachiko Miyano

Performed by Origa, KOKIA, Frances Maya, Shootie HG, Joelle, David Whitaker, Mina, Suginami Junior Chorus, Yu Manabe, Masahiko Todo, Aska Kaneko, Amiko Watabe, Masutami Endo, Mayumi Sano, Koji Nishimura, Otohiko Fujita, Ikuo Kakehashi, Takuro Iga, Taku Yabuki, Febian Reza Pane, Bob Zung, Yuya Ebisawa, Hideyuki Yonekawa, Shigekazu Aida, Teppei Kawasaki, Kentaro Nakao, Hitoshi Watanabe, Akiyoshi Shimizu, Taro Yoshida, Takashi Kashikura, George Kano, Yoichiro Yamauchi, Mikiko Ise, Naomi Urushibara, Kyoko Ishigame, Ken Okabe, Gen Takeuchi, Makiko Murakoshi, Tomomi Tokunaga, Yuichi Endo, Akiko Tajima, Yoko Fujinawa, Kiyo Kido, Risa Yamamoto, Satoko Jinbo, Kei Amano, Natsue Kameda, Maya Fraser, Yoshiko Kaneko, Yuya Yanagihara, Machi Okabe, Sohei Birmann, Atsuki Yoshida, Shu Watanabe, Osamu Iyoku, Ayaka Notomi, Maiko Sugiyama, Naoko Wakatabi, Yuko Kajitani, Ryoko Okouchi, Naoko Abe, Mari Asai, Gentaro Sakaguchi, Masaki Shono, Hyojin Kim, Sachie Onuma, Manami Tokutaka, Shinichiro Watanabe, Toshiyuki Akiyama, Fumiko Aoki, Reiichi Tateizumi, Mayu Takashima, Takahiro Yuki, Mao Tomonou, Jun Nakamura, Tomoki Iwanaga, Shinichi Eguchi, Masashi Abe, Ryosuke Moriyama, Hajime Terai, Kaori Morita, Koji Akaike, Kento Takasugi, Shigeki Ippon, Masashi Kimura, Atsushi Kuramochi, Kenichi Tsujimoto, Katsuji Hamaguchi, Sho Okumura, Teppei Kawakami, Kanade Shishiuchi, Hisato Yamaguchi, Hiroki Sato, Junko Yamashiro, Hitoshi Imai, Yuji Uesato, Sigeaki Hisanaga, Mina Muranaka, Atsushi Doyama, Jo Kishigami, Takahiro Tumori, Shinpei Tsugita, Midori Takada, Tomoko Kusakari, Ryoichi Kayatani, Hideyo Takakuwa, Junko Wakamatsu, Michiyo Morikawa, Satoshi Shoji, Junko Suzuki, Kimio Yamane, Yumiko Itoi, Fumie Kuro, Akio Osawa, Yumi Kikkawa, Yuko Taguchi, Mari Ide, Michiko Maeda, Miki Yoshimura, Yurika Watanabe, Atsuko Okawa, Rika Hayashi, Chikayo Hanashima, Etsuyo Ota, Kazuhiro Komiya, Yasutaka Anzai, Takahiro Nagai, Katsuaki Fukui, Shin Sugie, Takahiko
